name: Skill Creator
description: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.
longDescription: Walks through creating Claude Code skills with references on output patterns and workflow design. Includes Python scripts for scaffolding (init), packaging, and quick-validating skills. Covers SKILL.md structure, frontmatter fields, script bundling, and best practices for making skills that work reliably across sessions.
